content: 1 305 snowflake 36 variant 2 3 yarn pelican 50g/330m or any classic thread #10 crochet hook 1 00mm clover use the scheme 4 5 abbreviation mg magic_ring sliding loop slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet dtr double treble_crochet 3 times yarn over the hook increase increase 2 stitches into the same loop 3ch-arch arch from 3 chains 3ch-picot - 3 chain picot - chain 3 slip_stitch into the 1st chain triple picot triple 3ch-picot make *3ch-picot* - repeat 2 more times add 1slst in 1st loop of 1st picot to form triple picot 3ch-8ch-4ch make 4ch-picot then 8ch-picot then 4ch- picot make 1slst in 1st loop of 1st picot to form 3-double_crochet cluster puff into same stitch make 3 half-closed double crochet and then catch the yarn and pull back through all loops at once pr previous row repeat repeat yo- yarn over the hook 6 note in the 3rd row make 1slst between the petals not in the scheme photo of the row description 1 8ch join into the ring with 1slst 7 2 1ch *1sc 12ch* - repeat 5 more times 1slst in 1st single_crochet total 6 petals 3 *work in 12ch loop 3sc 3hdc 4ch-picot 3hdc triple picot 4ch-8ch-4ch 3hdc 4ch-picot 3hdc 3sc 1slst between the petals* - repeat 5 more times for the handle make 70-80ch between the petals 1slst to join cut the yarn hide all tails wash and steam ready design work by starostina olga more easy crochet motif patterns are here -
